page.title: 08The Community Centre
page.content: On Sunday the tables and chairs are put out for Bingo on Monday.On Monday at 9.30 a.m.Playschool for the 3 year olds starts.There is a break for dinner at 12.15.They start again in the afternoon and finish at about 3 0'clock.Playschool goes on from Monday to Friday.On Tuesday at 6.00 p.m. the Brownies use the Centre and on Wednesday the hall is prepared for the Disco which starts at 6.30 p.m. It ends at 8.30 p.m.On Thursday after playschool the staff put out the tables and chairs for Bingo.It is held from 7.00 to 9.00 p.m.On Saturday the Community Centre is occasionally used for jumble sales, pantomimes and concerts.When there is an election it is used as a polling station.
